description: System-generated unique identifier for the jurisdiction record; serves as the primary key for referencing this row.
Date-time the row was created or last updated, stored as a compact yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm numeric string for auditing and synchronization.
Official name of the jurisdiction (state, province, or territory) used for display and reporting.
Standard two-letter postal abbreviation for the jurisdiction used in addresses, compliance, and integrations.
Likely fuel tax rate set by the jurisdiction (e.g., currency per gallon/liter) used for IFTA or billing calculations; confirm definition and units with SME.
Legacy system identifier corresponding to this jurisdiction, used for migration mapping and cross-system reconciliation; confirm source system.
Name of the source table in the legacy system from which this record originated; used for lineage and troubleshooting.
